generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A paved area alongside the road, separated by a curb, where bicycles are parked and pedestrians are walking, indicating it is a sidewalk.
- building: Tall structures with windows and commercial signs (e.g., "KYOTO") are visible along the right side of the road, which are buildings.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves line both sides of the road, which qualifies as vegetation.
- terrain: Grass and greenery are visible along the left side of the road, which is terrain.
- sky: The upper part of the image shows a bright, overcast sky, visible above the trees and buildings.
- person: A few individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A white van is visible on the left side of the road, and other cars can be seen further down the road.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign and a red arrow sign on a pole on the left side of the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and street lights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
